title: Lefevere Dishes Details of Quick-Step Mega-Merger with Jumbo-Visma, Expects ‘More Clarity by Monday’
content:
Lefevere lifts lid on sponsorship structures, Remco Evenepoel, states 'letter of intent' has been signed on blockbuster deal.

Read the full article at Lefevere Dishes Details of Quick-Step Mega-Merger with Jumbo-Visma, Expects ‘More Clarity by Monday’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
